_comment: Phoenix Wright Accessibility Mod - English strings. Translators: edit values only, not keys.
investigation.mode_entry_with_unexamined: Investigation mode. {0} points of interest, {1} unexamined.
investigation.mode_start_no_points: Investigation mode. No points of interest found.
investigation.controls_hint: Use [ and ] to navigate, U to jump to next unexamined point, H to list all.
luminol.mode_entry: Luminol spray mode. {0} blood traces to find.
luminol.all_discovered: Blood trace found! All traces discovered.
luminol.pan_hint: Press Q to pan if needed.
fingerprint.start: Fingerprint examination. {0} locations to examine. Use [ and ] to navigate, Enter to examine. Press H for hint.
fingerprint.powder_phase: Powder phase. Move cursor with arrow keys while pressing Enter to spread powder across the area. Press E to blow when done.
fingerprint.powder_hint: Move cursor with arrow keys while pressing Enter to spread powder across the area. Press E to blow away excess and reveal the print.
fingerprint.powder_state: Powder phase. Move cursor with arrow keys while pressing Enter to apply powder. Press E to blow when done.
fingerprint.comparison_start: Fingerprint comparison. Use Left/Right to select suspect, E to compare. Press H for hint.
fingerprint.comparison_hint: Use Left/Right to select suspect, E to compare.
fingerprint.comparison_state: Fingerprint comparison. {0} selected. Press H for hint.
fingerprint.comparison_phase: Fingerprint comparison phase. Press H for hint.
fingerprint.selection_hint: {0} fingerprint locations to examine. Use [ and ] to navigate between locations, Enter to examine the selected area.
fingerprint.selection_state: Selection phase. {0}Use [ and ] to navigate, Enter to examine. Press H for hint.
fingerprint.location_announce: Location {0} of {1} ({2}). Press Enter to examine.
fingerprint.navigation_hint: Use [ and ] to navigate fingerprint locations, Enter to examine.
fingerprint.selection_only: Navigation only available in selection phase
fingerprint.examination_state: Fingerprint examination. Press H for hint.
fingerprint.no_powder: No powder on fingerprint. Move cursor while pressing Enter to apply powder.
vase.start: Vase puzzle. Use Left/Right to select pieces, Q/R to rotate. Press H for hint, E to combine.
vase.start_final_piece: Vase puzzle, final piece. Use Q/R to rotate. Press H for hint, E to combine.
vase.rotation_correct: Rotation correct. Press E to combine.
vase.wrong_piece: Wrong piece or rotation. Press H for hint.
vase_show.start: Unstable jar rotation puzzle. Rotate the jar to match the Blue Badger silhouette. H and N for X axis, M and B for Y axis, Q and R for Z axis. Press I for current position, G for hint, E to present.
vase_show.all_aligned: All axes aligned! Press Enter to submit.
evidence_3d.hotspot_detected: Hotspot detected, press Enter to examine
evidence_3d.opened: 3D examination: {0}. {1} hotspots. Use [ and ] to navigate hotspots. J to zoom in, E to zoom out.
dying_message.puzzle_start: Dying message puzzle. {0} dots. Connect dots to spell EMA. Use [ and ] to navigate dots, Enter on a dot to start a line, Enter on another dot to connect. Backspace to undo last line. Press H for hint.
dying_message.line_started: Line started from dot {0} ({1}). Navigate to another dot and press Enter to connect.
dying_message.state: Dying message. {0}{1} lines drawn. Status: {2}. Press H for hint.
dying_message.hint_fallback: Connect the dots to spell EMA. For E: connect 1-2, 1-6, 6-7. For M: connect 3-4, 3-10. For A: connect 5-11, 5-12, 8-9.
dying_message.hint_lines_drawn: {0} lines drawn. Connect dots to form the correct pattern.
dying_message.hint_start: Spell EMA by connecting dots. Start with E: connect dot 1 (E top-left) to dot 2 (E top-right), then dot 1 to dot 6 (E bottom-left).
dying_message.hint_continue_e: Continue E: connect dot 6 (E bottom-left) to dot 7 (E bottom-right). Then start M: connect dot 3 (M top-right) to dot 4 (M middle-left) and to dot 10 (M bottom).
dying_message.hint_draw_a: Now draw A: connect dot 5 (A top) to dot 11 (A bottom-left), dot 5 to dot 12 (A bottom-right), and dot 8 to dot 9 for the crossbar.
dying_message.hint_done: {0} lines drawn. Press E to present when done, or Backspace to undo last line.
dying_message.hint_generic: Dying message puzzle. Use [ and ] to navigate dots, Enter to connect, Backspace to undo, E to present.
bug_sweeper.mode_entry: Signal detector mode.{0} Move cursor to scan for listening devices.{1}
bug_sweeper.move_to_scan: Move cursor to scan for listening devices.
court_record.page_navigation_hint: Press left or right for pages.
menu.select_game: Select game. Use left and right to choose game, then select Play Title or Select Episode.
menu.episode_selection: Episode selection. Use left and right to choose episode.
menu.chapter_selection: Chapter selection. Use left and right to choose episode, up and down to choose chapter.
menu.game_title.gs2: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Justice for All
menu.game_title.gs3: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Trials and Tribulations
gallery.opened: Gallery. Use up and down to select.
video_tape.start: Video tape examination. Backspace to play/pause, Enter to fast forward, J to rewind, E to present. Press H for hint.
video_tape.target_x_of_y: Target {0} of {1}. Press E to present.
video_tape.target_needs_adjustment: Target {0} of {1}. Cursor positioned but may need adjustment. Use arrow keys to fine-tune, then E to present.
video_tape.pause_first: Pause the video first with Backspace
video_tape.no_targets_at_frame: No targets available at this frame
video_tape.hint_first: First viewing: Find Goodman's locker lit up (open) - around frame 120. Pause when you hear target available, press ] to select it, then E to present. Current frame: {0}.
video_tape.hint_second: Second viewing: Something falls from the locker. A wrong target appears around frame 460. The correct falling object is around frame 490. Fast forward with Enter past 460, pause with Backspace around 490, press ] to cycle through targets until you find the falling object, then E to present. Current frame: {0}.
video_tape.hint_third: Third viewing: The correct target is around frame 1360. Fast forward with Enter, pause with Backspace around 1360, press ] to select the target, then E to present. Current frame: {0}.
video_tape.hint_fourth: Fourth viewing: The correct target is around frame 900. Fast forward with Enter, pause with Backspace around 900, press ] to select the target, then E to present. Current frame: {0}.
video_tape.hint_generic: Pause when you hear target available, press ] to select it, then E to present. Current frame: {0}.
orchestra.controls_help: Music player controls: Up and Down select tracks. Left and Right jump by four tracks. Z and X change albums. J and N cycle play modes. Tab skips to next track, Q to previous. Enter plays or stops. I announces current state. Backspace exits.
orchestra.opened: Music player. Press F1 for controls.
